turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to place an order from a place called Bella Luna, it's a pizza place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three small pizzas, a cheese, a pepperoni and a meat lovers and then extra cheese on all of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please note that Bella Luna charges extra for additional cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas, one cheese, one pepperoni, and one meatlovers, all with extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total will be $42, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes, can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's going to be it.
